entry.title: Git Submodules as Nix Flake Inputs
entry.summary: Nix flakes support self.submodules = true, allowing git submodules to be referenced as flake inputs via path: URLs. This approach offers distinct advantages over GitHub-based inputs when co-developing dependencies alongside your main configuration.

entry.title: Replacing docker-compose with Nix for development
